MONTPELIER, Vt. (AP) The U.S. Chamber of Commerce and a top o… [+5057 chars]
articles.description: The lawsuit argues the U.S. Constitution precludes the act and that the state law is preempted by the federal Clean Air Act.
articles.title: U.S. Chamber, Oil Industry Sue Vermont Over Law Requiring Companies To Pay For Climate Change Damage

articles.author: AP
articles.content: MISSION, Kan. (AP) Road conditions were deteriorating Saturday in the central U.S. as a winter storm brought a mix of snow, ice and plunging temperatures, with forecasts calling for the dreaded combo… [+7769 chars]
articles.description: “Winter returned,” said Bob Oravec, lead forecaster at the National Weather Service in College Park, Maryland.
articles.title: Snow, Ice And Plunging Temps Grip Central U.S. Before Winter Storm Moves East

articles.title: German Leader Is More Worried About Elon Musk's Backing Of Far-Right Party Than His Insults

articles.content: DEIR AL-BALAH, Gaza Strip (AP) Israeli strikes killed at least 42 people in Gaza, including children, overnight and into Friday, hospital and emergency response workers said, as health workers and Is… [+6996 chars]
articles.description: Al-Aqsa Martyrs Hospital staff said that more than a dozen women and children were killed in strikes in central Gaza, including in Nuseirat, Zawaida, Maghazi and Deir al-Balah.
articles.title: Israeli Strikes Kill At Least 42 In Gaza As Ceasefire Talks Set To Resume In Qatar

A family vlogger and online rapper whose YouTube channel amassed over 1 million subscribers is accused of briefly kidnapping a woman in Texas before then relocating outside the U.S.

articles.description: Corey Pritchett Jr. is known for his YouTube videos about relationships and family, as well as his rap career.
articles.title: Family Vlogger Accused Of Briefly Kidnapping Woman In Texas Before Flying Off To Qatar

articles.content:

articles.title: Prince William 'Shocked' After Learning Of Personal Connection To New Orleans Attack
